org.exist.storage.statistics
Class DataGuide

java.lang.Object
  org.exist.storage.statistics.DataGuide

public class DataGuide
extends Object

Collects statistics about the distribution of elements in a document or even the entire database. The class creates a graph structure which describes all possible element paths and their frequency. For example, for a TEI document, a typical path could be: 

TEI[44,63330] -> text[44,62757] -> body[44,44206] -> div[300,5584] -> p[5336,820]
which means there are 44 TEI, text and body elements in the db with 300 div children and 5336 paragraphs below them. The second number indicates the size of the largest element, expressed as the number of descendant elements below the node. The largest p node in this distribution has 820 elements below it.

Method Detail

getSize

public int getSize()

add

public org.exist.storage.statistics.NodeStats add(NodePath path)
Add the given node path (a path like /root/childA/childB) to the data guide. The frequency for the target element (i.e. the last component in the path) is incremented by one.

mergeInto

public DataGuide mergeInto(DataGuide other)
Merge paths and statistics from this instance into the other instance.

the other instance containing the merged graphs
